tasks.title: Setup Unity Project and VR Environment
tasks.description: Initialize Unity project with required settings for VR development and integrate Oculus Integration SDK.
tasks.details: Create new Unity 2022.3 LTS project. Install Universal Render Pipeline (URP) and Oculus Integration SDK. Configure project for VR target (Oculus Quest 2/3, Rift S). Set up basic scene with VR camera rig.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify Unity project opens and compiles. Confirm VR camera rig is present and functional in editor and on device.

tasks.title: Implement Basic Player Controller and Movement
tasks.description: Develop core player controller for VR, supporting movement and basic interaction.
tasks.details: Use XR Interaction Toolkit to implement player controller. Support teleportation and smooth locomotion. Map controller inputs for movement and basic actions.
tasks.testStrategy: Test movement and teleportation in VR. Ensure no motion sickness and controls are intuitive.

tasks.title: Integrate XR Interaction Toolkit
tasks.description: Set up XR Interaction Toolkit for standard VR interactions.
tasks.details: Install and configure XR Interaction Toolkit. Implement basic grab, release, and UI interaction. Map controller inputs for interaction.
tasks.testStrategy: Test grab, release, and UI interaction in VR. Ensure all mapped actions work as intended.

tasks.title: Develop Single Virtual Environment (Nature Theme)
tasks.description: Create a basic virtual environment for initial user experience.
tasks.details: Design and build a simple natural environment in Unity. Add basic 3D assets and terrain. Set up lighting and environment effects.
tasks.testStrategy: Test environment loading and rendering. Check for performance and visual quality.

tasks.title: Implement Object Interaction System
tasks.description: Enable users to interact with objects using hand tracking and physics.
tasks.details: Use XR Interaction Toolkit for object grabbing and physics. Implement basic feedback (visual, haptic). Support throwing and assembling objects.
tasks.testStrategy: Test object grabbing, throwing, and assembly. Verify feedback is present and intuitive.

tasks.title: Build Core UI System for VR
tasks.description: Develop intuitive VR UI for menus and information display.
tasks.details: Design 3D UI elements in Unity. Implement menu navigation and information display. Ensure UI is accessible and does not break immersion.
tasks.testStrategy: Test UI navigation and information display in VR. Check for accessibility and immersion.

tasks.title: Add Basic Physics Simulation
tasks.description: Implement physics for objects and environment interactions.
tasks.details: Configure Unity physics settings. Add colliders and rigidbodies to interactive objects. Test object collisions and gravity.
tasks.testStrategy: Test object collisions and physics behavior. Ensure stability and performance.

tasks.title: Implement Multiplayer Networking
tasks.description: Enable multiple users to join and interact in the same virtual space.
tasks.details: Integrate Photon PUN2 for multiplayer networking. Set up player synchronization and basic chat. Test with multiple clients.
tasks.testStrategy: Test multiplayer connection and synchronization. Verify chat and basic interaction between users.

tasks.title: Develop Avatar Customization System
tasks.description: Allow users to customize their avatars and personal spaces.
tasks.details: Design avatar customization UI. Implement selection and modification of avatar features. Allow users to save preferences.
tasks.testStrategy: Test avatar customization and preference saving. Ensure changes persist across sessions.

tasks.title: Add Voice Chat and Social Features
tasks.description: Implement voice chat and social interaction tools.
tasks.details: Integrate voice chat using Photon Voice. Add gesture communication and basic social features. Test with multiple users.
tasks.testStrategy: Test voice chat and gesture communication. Ensure social features work as intended.

tasks.title: Implement Achievement and Progress System
tasks.description: Track user achievements and progress within the platform.
tasks.details: Design achievement and progress UI. Implement badge system and progress tracking. Save user data to cloud storage.
tasks.testStrategy: Test achievement unlocking and progress tracking. Verify data persistence and UI updates.

tasks.title: Optimize Performance and Debug
tasks.description: Optimize VR performance and resolve bugs.
tasks.details: Profile and optimize rendering and physics. Fix bugs and improve stability. Test on target hardware.
tasks.testStrategy: Test performance and stability on target devices. Ensure smooth experience and minimal bugs.
